name: ObjectiveCConvertibleAttributedStringKey
desc: A protocol that defines Objective-C interoperability with an attribute key’s value type.

items.name: associatedtype ObjectiveCValue
items.desc: The Objective-C type that corresponds to this key’s value type.

items.name: static func objectiveCValue(for: Self.Value) -> Self.ObjectiveCValue
items.desc: Returns an Objective-C typed value for a given value of this key’s type.

items.name: static func value(for: Self.ObjectiveCValue) -> Self.Value
items.desc: Returns a value of this key’s type for a given Objective-C value.
